Learn more at Veritas.com.Veritas Global Security OfficeGroup: Global Physical Security (GPS)Role: Sr Physical Security SpecialistJob Title(s): Program Manager, Global Security SystemsReports to: Head of Global Physical SecurityHighest Level Responsibilities:Identify and protect the company from tactical and strategic risk

Develop and cultivate strategic relationships with internal and external stakeholders to consistently deliver high quality solutions to company staff and leaders  Accountable For:Day to day physical security systems management at all Veritas offices and facilities globallyMonitoring and assessing the performance of the global physical security systems (Genetec, Avigilon, Alert Enterprise)

Providing first-level systems support to Veritas staff and team members

Participating in and leading cross-functional teams inside and outside GPS to increase security effectiveness and awareness and to drive value to the Veritas businessQualifications:Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in a relevant field (security system integrator, security, criminal justice, electrical engineering, etc)

Ability to speak fluently in English
